duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on site and remotely with clients to understand the client’s high-level corporate goals that can be impacted by improved workforce management practices.
Establish goals and define supporting workforce management initiatives and solutions.
Define the benefits that will accrue to the company if the initiatives are successful and create this linkage in tailored Business Case presentation.
Must be comfortable working with C-level executives in this process.
Deliver innovative and compelling presentations of business case deliverables in a high energy, clear, and compelling manner.
Represent UKG as the thought leader in Workforce Management.
Conduct deep data analysis to prove critical business issues that can be resolved by implementing UKG solutions.
Understand new concepts and complex procedures and to logically analyze those procedures to identify potential problem areas.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
